entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
